The Short NAP: Friday 5th Janurary 2007

Jan 4, 2007 • Aaron Parker

Microsoft have posted some updated NAP documents on microsoft.com/downloads today:

  • Internet Protocol Security Enforcement in the Network Access Protection Platform
  • Network Access Protection Platform Architecture
  • Configuring Network Access Protection Policies in Windows Server “Longhorn”
  • Introduction to Network Access Protection

The Network Access Protection Platform Architecture document looks to be the most interesting document that goes into some detail on the NAP components.
